#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	string str1,str2;
	int s[1000001];
	int l1,l2,l,index,itr,carry,ans,flag;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    int flag=0;
		cin>>str1>>str2;
		int sub=0;
		if(str1[0] == '-' && str2[0]!= '-')
			sub=1;
		else if(str1[0]!= '-' && str2[0]== '-')
			sub=1;
		if(str1[0]=='-')
			str1 = str1.substr(1);
		if(str2[0] == '-')
			str2 =str2.substr(1);
	//	cout<<str1 << " "<<str2;
		l1=str1.length();
		l2 = str2.length();
		l = l1+l2;
		index =0 ;
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
			s[i]=0;
			itr = index;
			
			for(int i=l2-1;i>-1;i--){
				itr = index;
				carry=0;
			for(int	j=l1-1;j>-1;j--){
				ans = (str2[i]-'0')*(str1[j]-'0')+carry;
				s[itr] += ans;
				carry = s[itr]/10;
				s[itr]%=10;
				itr++;}
			if(carry>0)
				s[itr] = carry;
			index++;}
	
		if(sub==1)
		  cout<<"-";
		for(int i=l-1;i>-1;i--){
			if(s[i]==0 && flag==0)
				continue;
			else{
				flag=1;
				cout<<s[i];}
		}
		if(flag==0)
			cout<<"0";
		cout<<endl;
		}
	return 0;
}
